about_the_game:
• From the same Team that made Solitude Underwater!

  • We present a FNAF-FPS Train Horror Adventure game!

Info

The apocalypse came and went and mutated all the animals into vicious monstrosities. The surviving people hide from these bloodthirsty beasts behind the tall, thick walls of their towns.

You are Blake O’Grady, a convict who’s agreed to become a train conductor for a chance at freedom. Your train’s not that fast, not that strong, and its route winds through all the deadliest parts of the no-man’s-land between towns.

Transfer vital supplies to each of the towns. Keep your train chugging along through every danger. Do what it takes to survive the mutant-infested wilds. And beware of The One, which is strongest of all…

Key Features

  • Transfer Supplies to every Town

  • Defend your Train from various mutated creatures

  • Upgrade your Gear and Weapon

  • Help the Townsfolk with Stealth missions outside the comforts of the Train and the Town's protection for a reward

  • Drive A Train Locomotive (with a train whistle)

WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES - READ THIS NOTICE BEFORE PLAYING

A very small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain kinds of flashing lights or light patterns. These persons, or even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy, may experience epileptic symptoms or seizures while playing video games. If you or any of your relatives has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before playing any video game.

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult a physician if you or your child experience any of the following symptoms: dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of awareness, disorientation, or convulsions. Parents should watch for or ask their children about the above symptoms.

You may reduce risk of photosensitive epileptic seizures by taking the following precautions: sit farther from the screen, use a smaller screen, play in a well-lit room, do not play when you are drowsy or fatigued.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / INTEL Arc A750
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Transfer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: From January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client has stopped the support on Windows 7 | Windows 8 | Windows 8.1.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 | Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT / INTEL Arc A750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Transfer supplies with a Train in a post apocalyptic world filled with creatures that you need to fend off to survive and do your goal
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Greek, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
